name: Casio Graphing Calculator Add-in File
summary: A G1A file is a data file saved in the G1A format used by various Casio graphing calculators, including fx-9860G, fx-9860GII, and fx-CG series calculators. It contains an add-in, which is typically used to add small games or utilities to select Casio graphing calculators. G1A files are written in C programming language.

open.note: Open with an associated app listed below.
